title: Palha-Carga
body: Common name for *Festuca Donax*, a grass 5 to 15 decimeters tall, with broad leaves and spikelets grouped in large, loose, and sometimes curved panicles. This plant is common in the ravines of the interior of Madeira. The *Brachypodium silvaticum*, with large spikelets grouped in a slightly inclined spike, is also known as palha-carga in various parts of the island.
